Post.title: tkinter
Post._content:
after

mainloopmainloopuirepaint



<!--more-->

# 
```python
import Tkinter as tk

def animation():
    label.configure(text=index)
if __name__ == '__main__':
    root = tk.Tk()
    label = tk.Label(root,text='test')
    # bing event 
    label.bind('<<Animation>>', animation)
    label.pack()
    root.mainloop()
    for i in range(10):
        index = i
        # use event_generate
        label.event_generate('<<Animation>>')

```

# 
```python
import Tkinter as tk

def animation():
    label.configure(text=index)
if __name__ == '__main__':
    root = tk.Tk()
    label = tk.Label(root,text='test')
    # bing event 
    label.bind('<<Animation>>', animation)
    label.pack()
    root.mainloop()
    for i in range(10):
        index = i
        # use event_generate
        label.event_generate('<<Animation>>')

```
